doc.field: Metropolitan Council cached base map web service, developed for 7 County Twin Cities Region. Includes political boundaries, roadways, parks, lakes and rivers, land marks, and transit information.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata> <idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>Metropolitan Council Base Map Service</title><origin>Metropolitan Council</origin><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>Periodically revised</pubdate><onlink>http://gis2.metc.state.mn.us/ArcGIS/rest/services/BaseLayer/UTMBaseMap/MapServer</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>Metropolitan Council cached base map web service, developed for 7 County Twin Cities Region. Includes political boundaries, roadways, parks, lakes and rivers, land marks, and transit information.</abstract><purpose>The service was developed to offer quick base map data that includes detailed cartography for 10 scales. Intended for use in desktop GIS and web applications to provide backdrop of common data layers.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area. Some data layers extend well into Minnesota and Wisconsin</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>Periodically Revised</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>The Base Map is updated on a quarterly basis (roughly: January, April, July, October) to allow for changes to roadways and major political/administrative boundary changes. Intermittent changes may occur between major quarterly updates.</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>Quarterly</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey></place><theme><themekey>base map, political boundaries, municipal boundaries, county boundaries, city boundaries, transportation, trails, roadways, transit</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Matt McGuire</cntper><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Web Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>Minnesota</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice /><cntfax /><cntemail>matt.mcguire@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/MetropolitanCouncilBaseMap.jpg</browsen><browsed>Base Map Image Example</browsed></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title /></citeinfo></crossref><native>ArcGIS Server</native></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>N/A</attraccr></attracc><logic>N/A</logic><complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar /></horizpa><vertacc><vertaccr /></vertacc></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>This service consists of data from several layers. These include (with metadata links): - County Boundaries - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/CountiesAndCTUs.htm - City, Townships and Unorganized Territory Boundaries - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/CountiesAndCTUs.htm - Lakes and Rivers - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/LakesAndRivers.htm - State and Regional Trails - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/TrailsRegional.htm - State and Regional Parks - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/ParksRegional.htm - Roads (NCompass Local Roads) - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/NCompassRoads.htm - Highways - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/Highways.htm - Airports - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/Airports.htm - Railroads - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/Railroads.htm - Light Rail Line - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/HiawathaLRTAlignment.htm - Transit Centers - http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/TransitCenters.htm - Landmarks: including schools, college campuses, hospitals, golf courses, commentaries, and other major destinations. -http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/NCompassLandmarks.htm
This base map web service consists of 10 different levels of detail that are displayed at 10 different map scale ranges. Scales: * Level ID: 0 Scale: 1:808907 * Level ID: 1 Scale: 1:404453 * Level ID: 2 Scale: 1:202227 * Level ID: 3 Scale: 1:101113 * Level ID: 4 Scale: 1:50557 * Level ID: 5 Scale: 1:25278 * Level ID: 6 Scale: 1:12639 * Level ID: 7 Scale: 1:6320 * Level ID: 8 Scale: 1:3160 * Level ID: 9 Scale: 1:1580</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref /><direct>Raster</direct><mgmg3obj>cached web service</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>Cached tiles for 10 scale levels, each tile 256x256 pixels, DPI 96.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><spref><horizsys><geograph><latres /><longres /><geogunit /></geograph><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm><spcs><spcszone /></spcs><mgmg4coz /><mgmg4adj /></gridsys><mapproj><mapprojn /><mgmg4par /><otherprj /></mapproj><planci><plandu>Meters</plandu><coordrep><absres /><ordres /></coordrep></planci></planar><geodetic><ellips>GRS80</ellips><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>None</eaover><eadetcit>None</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Matt McGuire</cntper><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Web Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>Minnesota</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice /><cntfax>651-602-1718</cntfax><cntemail>matt.mcguire@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib><resdesc>MetropolitanCouncilBaseMap</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
